text: “Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia oragh, kɨ ia bagha Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, ko gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba, ko Godɨn Arazibagh fozir gumaziba, me amangam. Eghtɨ ia men taraziv soghtɨ me arɨmɨghiram, egh tarazi isɨ ter ighuvibar me afughafugham, egh tarazi ian God ko mɨgeir dɨpenibar aven benibar me fozorogham. Egh ia uan nguibar ekiabar me batogh men gɨntɨghtɨ, me arɨ nguibar igharazibar mangam.
